definition: to go begging/to ask for alms
to invite/to provoke/to demand or ask for/to send armed forces to suppress/to denounce or condemn/to marry (a woman)/to discuss or study

sentences.english: Mother had to go begging after Father's death.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸歸天后，母親只患上去討乞。

sentences.english: Time can break your heart. Have you begging please, Begging please.
sentences.chinese: 時間會使你心碎，你是否還在苦苦討乞？
